full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGON SDE DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS DANG LAS THOGS PA RNAMS KYI BCA' YIG BLANG RDOR GSAL BAR BYED NYI MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES LAS TSAN PA YAN CHAD NI DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS GLING DANG DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GNYIS KYI DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS KYI BCA' YIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES DBU MDZAD CHOS RJE BZANG PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG T'A LE CHOS RJE KHU DPON SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR BKA' 'GYUR PA NO MON HAN GYIS SBYAR BA YIN LA, 'DI MAN CHAD NI LHA'I BTZUN PA'I BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS MDZAD PA YIN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
